articles.author: Ben Golliver
articles.title: Thrilling Pacers run Knicks ragged, reach first NBA Finals in 25 years - The Washington Post
articles.description: Indiana pulled away from New York in Game 6 on Saturday night, setting up a matchup with the Oklahoma City Thunder to decide a championship.
articles.content: INDIANAPOLIS James Johnson, the Indiana Pacers beloved enforcer, pulled his white pickup truck onto Delaware Street around midnight and waved out his window to acknowledge the jubilant swarms of gold… [+7663 chars]
